## R{#sec-install-packages}

```{r rpackages}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

# Construction de l'URL du dépôt
REPOSITR="https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/latest"

# Installation des packages R recommandés
# install.packages('tidyverse', repos=REPOSITR, dependencies=TRUE)
# install.packages('ggraph', repos=REPOSITR, dependencies=TRUE)
install.packages('sdcMicro', repos=REPOSITR, dependencies=TRUE)
install.packages('GaussSuppression', repos=REPOSITR, dependencies=TRUE)
install.packages('cellKey', repos=REPOSITR, dependencies=TRUE)
install.packages('synthpop', repos=REPOSITR, dependencies=TRUE)

```

## packages

### The package`rtauargus`

offers to install the version with an experimental extension:

### Package

```{r rtauargus}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

# Installation de la dernière version de rtauargus 
# (version avec extension expérimentale)
install.packages('remotes', repos=REPOSITR)
remotes::install_github(
    'InseeFrLab/rtauargus',
    dependencies = TRUE,
    build_vignettes = FALSE,
    upgrade = 'never',
    ref = "v-1.2.999-dev"
)

```

## Software

### `Tau-ARGUS (Windows / 32 bits)`

- The latest version is available on GitHub at this address:  
  <https://github.com/sdcTools/tauargus/releases/latest>
- Download the file`TauArgusXXXX.zip`where`XXXX`corresponds to the number of the latest version
- Once installed, simply unzip the file to the desired location on your machine.

To launch`Tau-ARGUS`, simply double-click on the file`TauArgus.exe`in the root directory of the unzipped folder.

Some documentation—a little outdated—can be downloaded[here](https://research.cbs.nl/casc/Software/TauManualV4.1.pdf)

### `Mu-ARGUS (Windows / 64 bits)`

The latest version is also available on GitHub at this address:
<https://github.com/sdcTools/tauargus/releases/latest>

The installation procedure is identical to that of`Tau-ARGUS`.

Some documentation (a bit old) can be downloaded at this address:

<https://research.cbs.nl/casc/Software/MUmanual5.1.3.pdf>
